title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 6 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Jul 6 2022
description:
New York Times "forgot" to print Declaration of Independence for the first time in 100 years on July 4th. Washington Post claims DeSantis is smarter than Trump and that makes him more of a threat. WNBA's Brittney Griner pleads with Biden for her release from Russian prison. Supermarket shelves bare as Dutch farmers continue nationwide protests. Aide for NYC’s jet-skiing mayor robbed at gunpoint. Worst mayor in the country, Lori "F**k Clarence Thomas!" Lightfoot, wants to get rid of "toxicity in our public discourse."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
